institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 25-2 (Application and Support for Training Course Operation Costs)
contents: Article 25-2 (Application and support for training course operation expenses) If the Chairman pays training course operation expenses pursuant to Article 19 (3) 1 to 3 and 6 to 9 of the Regulations, the final business plan and attached table must be submitted. 1 You can apply in accordance with the “Detailed Standards for Support for Joint Training Centers, etc.” Revised 2023. 4. 25.
